mapper.update: update restaurant set review_count = review_count + 1, review_avg = ((review_count - 1) * review_avg + #{rate}) / review_count where restaurant_id = #{restaurantId}

update restaurant set review_count = case when review_count >= 1 then review_count - 1 else 0 end, review_avg = case when review_count >= 1 then ((review_count + 1) * review_avg - #{rate}) / review_count else 0 end where restaurant_id = #{restaurantId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO restaurant(owner_id, name, category, content, phone, capacity, open_time, last_order_time, address, detail_address, lunch_price, dinner_price, saved_count, review_count, review_avg) VALUES (#{ownerId}, #{name}, #{category}, #{content}, #{phone}, #{capacity}, #{openTime}, #{lastOrderTime}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{lunchPrice}, #{dinnerPrice}, #{savedCount}, #{reviewCount}, #{reviewAvg});
